column4: can someone help:  i am trying to restore my grub boot menu (installed windows7 dual boot) through the  live cd.  at the grub terminal i type "fine /boot/grub/stage1" and i get "error 15: file not found."  any ideas anyone?
try find stage1 or try  the tab key. it can do name completion.
tabbing yields: "error  12: ivnalid device requested" and find stage1 yields "error 11: unrecognized device string"  and how could i be using "find" incorrectly?  ^_^
